name: Galaxy Blaster Z
description:
Can you battle through 12 waves of enemies to battle the dreadnought? Enjoy exciting arcade action, with Galaxy Blaster Z!

Controls:

WASD - flight
Space - fire
Esc - Pause

There are 6 levels of powerup. Getting hit reduces your power level (depending on difficulty). After the first three levels there is a random chance a new type of weapon will drop: either a blast wave weapon or a mega-blast weapon. Good luck.

V1.2 Update-

Fixed bug with collider on turret in final battle

Added UI labels for weapon strength and current weapon.

Changed the color of enemy blasts to be more visible.

V1.1 Update-

Fixed bug with player health not updating correctly.

Fixed bug with Mega-Blast weapon tiers.
